title: Large-Scale Online Learning Analytics and Effective Adoption Strategies Using LMS Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A course supporting advanced mathematics learners in systematically utilizing LMS tools. Learners independently schedule their use of LMS analytics, practice managing educational materials and applying assessment tools, and explore effective teaching strategies in large-scale online learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can visualize data from three or more lectures using core analytical tools in the LMS
Learners can diagnose the LMS utilization level of courses they are responsible for by applying the DOU (Depth-of-Use) model
Learners can design automation systems for attendance, assignments, and assessments in small-scale math lectures using LMS tools

resources: Access Permissions for LMS (Learning Management System) Platforms

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
